story: You hear a low hum coming from an alcove ahead. As you approach, you see a group of robotic guardians stationed there. What do you do?

actions.action: Sneak past the robotic guards undetected
actions.good: You move stealthily past the robotic guards without alerting them. You discover a stash of valuable items hidden in the alcove.
actions.bad: Your attempt to sneak past the robotic guards draws unwanted attention, triggering their automatic defense mechanisms. You take damage as they unleash a barrage of high-tech weaponry on you.

actions.action: Engage the robotic guards in combat
actions.good: You charge forward into battle with the robotic guards, utilizing your skills to emerge victorious. You claim the valuable items from their defeated bodies.
actions.bad: Your decision to engage the robotic guards results in a fierce and brutal skirmish. Your health dwindles as you fight for survival against their advanced technological weaponry.

actions.action: Find an alternate route around the robotic guards
actions.good: Using your keen sense of observation, you discover a hidden passage behind the robotic guards that leads to the alcove containing the valuable items. You emerge victorious with your prize.
actions.bad: As you search for an alternate route around the robotic guards, you stumble upon a booby trap set by the gang members. The resulting explosion sends you flying and takes a toll on your health.
